knimeNode.name: Spark Numeric Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes certain statistics between the a numeric column's values and predicted values.

fullDescription.intro: This node computes certain statistics between the a numeric column's values (ri) and predicted (pi) values. It computes R²=1-SSres/SStot=1-Σ(pi-ri)²/Σ(ri-1/n*Σri)² (can be negative!), mean absolute error (1/n*Σ|pi-ri|), mean squared error (1/n*Σ(pi-ri)²), root mean squared error (sqrt(1/n*Σ(pi-ri)²)), and mean signed difference (1/n*Σ(pi-ri)). The computed values can be inspected in the node's view and/or further processed using the output table.

The scores can be exported as flow variables.

ports.inPort: Arbitrary input Spark RDD with at least two numeric columns to compare.
ports.outPort:
The computed statistical measures:
R² - coefficient of determination, 1-SS_res/SS_tot
Mean squared error - 1/n*Σ((p_i-r_i)²)
Mean absolute error - 1/n*Σ|p_i-r_i|
Root mean squared error - Sqrt(1/n*Σ((p_i-r_i)²))
Mean signed difference - 1/n*Σ(p_i - r_i)

views.view: A table with the statistical measures
